issue.title: [C++] Cannot compiled pass with Wunused-parameter flag
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8825](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8825). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
arrow's header: array.h has a function value_length(int64_t i) ...

the i is unused parameter, if i compile it with -Werror / -Wunused-parameter flag, it will get a failure.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8825?focusedCommentId=17127199) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7361
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7361>
